dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to approach the Inferno Bringer? Speak carefully, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your words sound hollow, your presence disturbs the flames.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion, I shall leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies are meaningless. Leave before the flames consume you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, as you wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good choice. Walk away while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave, stand back!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you will regret your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand my ground, I seek knowledge about the Inferno Bringer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals are ignorant creatures, unfit to comprehend the Inferno Bringer's power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respectfully withdraw my request.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Seek knowledge elsewhere, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall depart, thank you for your time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now, before the flames whisper your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not fear your threats, continue to seek knowledge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool, you shall learn the price of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand answers, reveal the secrets of the Inferno Bringer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand? Mortals are insolent. The Inferno Bringer reveals to those deemed worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly request to be considered worthy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words hold a hint of reverence. The Inferno Bringer observes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I await the Inferno Bringer's judgment.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Patience is a virtue. The Inferno Bringer shall reveal when the time is right.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Impatience grows within me, I demand an audience now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudence leads to destruction. The Inferno Bringer condemns your impatience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not beg for knowledge, I will take what is mine by force.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brashness leads to torment, the Inferno Bringer does not yield to threats.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I will leave and seek knowledge elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Learn from this encounter. The Inferno Bringer's secrets are not for the arrogant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand firm, I will claim the knowledge regardless.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness blinds the foolish. The Inferno Bringer will scorch your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear neither flames nor threats, I am here to challenge the Inferno Bringer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. You seek a challenge with the flames that birthed you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek not a battle, I seek an ally in the Inferno Bringer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ally? Mortals dream of alliances with the flames, yet few endure the baptism.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my loyalty and service, let us unite.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Loyalty must be proven, not spoken. The flames judge with impartiality.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall prove my worth, guide me in the trial.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The trial awaits. Walk the path of flames and embrace your destiny.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retract my offer, I shall find strength elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As expected, mortals flee when faced with true trial.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense treachery in your flames, I will not be your puppet.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Suspicion shields the weak-minded. The flames care not for the paranoid.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I trust my instincts, I shall leave this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is a rare sight. Depart, and do not return unless the flames beckon.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will challenge your flames, let my actions prove my intentions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish courage leads to swift ends. The flames shall test your resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek an alliance or knowledge, only to assert my dominance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dominance? Mortals strive to rule over what they cannot comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge the flames of the Inferno Bringer, let them bow to me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance blinds the ambitious. The flames shall humble your pride.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield to your flames, I understand my place now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acceptance is the first step. Leave, and remember your place.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I resist your flames, I will not bow to your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance invites destruction. The flames shall incinerate your defiance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am the true fire, the Inferno Bringer will kneel before me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Delusions of grandeur fuel the foolish. The Inferno Bringer will extinguish your hubris.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I retract my claims, I seek no confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A rare moment of clarity. Retreat, and spare yourself from the inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My flames burn brighter, prepare for the clash of powers.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The flames of arrogance shall be quenched by the Inferno Bringer's fury.
